articles.title: Twitch streamer Puppers, who lived with MND, dies aged 32 - BBC
articles.description: The gamer, known for playing Dead by Daylight, dies after being diagnosed with motor neurone disease.
articles.content:
Popular streamer Puppers has died aged 32, three years after being diagnosed with motor neurone disease (MND).
